sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you <radical>mix</radical> different types of <radical>power</radical> you'll produce something <kanji>effective</kanji>.
meaningInfo: It doesn't matter what power you mix, because all power is strong. No matter what you use this mixed power on, it will be effective. Imagine some situations where you mix power with power.
readingMnemonic: The most <kanji>effective</kanji> mix of two powers is two <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja>s. Take one, mix it with another, and you have something with immeasurable power. You use it to attack that animal-like creature. It's super effective!
readingInfo: <ja>こういち</ja>s punch attack was super effective against that Pikurchort.
